skillTree.localised_description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.
The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.localised_description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.
Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mother of all that have come after her, each living Fellheart knows to bow and scrape when in the presence of the Dread Matriarch.

effects.description: Slave Cost: -75% for Sacrifice to Anath Raema and Sacrifice to Mathlann

skillTree.localised_description: As those around them realize that they are little more than toys and playthings to the Dark Elves, the grins grow wider on the Dark Elven faces.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: Never wait, never hestitate. Speed to the target, slay the defenders, escape with the bounty.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10% for Corsairs units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20% for Corsairs units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +30% for Corsairs units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: House Fellheart fights with the strength of all of its members, not only the lord of the house.

effects.description: Character will share +33% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +33%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Above all else, bring home the gold. And the slaves.
A smart corsair never lets a good slave get away. Or anything else they can get their hands on.
The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

skillTree.localised_description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

skillTree.localised_description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

enabled_if: Unit has exceeded the murderous prowess value

backgroundSkills.localised_name: Mother of House Fellheart, Tormentor of Cathay
backgroundSkills.localised_description: Laithikir opened the land of Cathay to pillage and despoilment by the Black Arks of Naggarond, and with the wealth she stole in such endeavours, founded House Fellheart, greatest of all the naval families of the Dark Elves.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear when fighting against Cathay
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror when fighting against Cathay

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description:
Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(Lord's army)
